displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Gameplay
displayProperties.description: You could argue that all weapon mods affect gameplay, but these affect it in some way that isn't covered in other categories.  How's that for precision?

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Stocks
displayProperties.description: This represents modifications to the stock of your weapon.  Hopefully it has a nice dividend reinvestment plan to go with it.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods
displayProperties.description: Mods that can be applied to weapons.

displayProperties.name: Sparrow Mods: Speed
displayProperties.description: These mods boost the speed of sparrows.

displayProperties.name: Finishers
displayProperties.description: Rush a weakened enemy to activate a devastating final blow..

displayProperties.name: Ghost Mods: Perks
displayProperties.description: These mods represent perks or bonuses that can be applied to Ghosts.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Ornaments/Warlock
displayProperties.description: These are Ornaments that can only be applied to Warlock armor.

displayProperties.name: Ticket Mods
displayProperties.description: Modifiers on an activity or event ticket, that provide you additional challenges.

displayProperties.name: Repeatable Bounties
displayProperties.description: Repeatable bounties that you can purchase from various vendors.

displayProperties.name: Ghost Mods: Projections
displayProperties.description: Give your ghost a fancy holographic projection.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Ornaments
displayProperties.description: This represents ways to make your weapons look prettier.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Class/Hunter
displayProperties.description: These mods can only be applied to Hunter class items.

displayProperties.name: Bounties
displayProperties.description: Bounties are brief missions that you can pick up from NPCs in the world.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Sword Blades
displayProperties.description: These represent different blades that can be applied to a sword.

displayProperties.name: Sparrow Mods
displayProperties.description: These mods can only be applied to Sparrows.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Chest
displayProperties.description: These mods can only be applied to chest armor.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Class/Warlock
displayProperties.description: These mods can only be applied to Warlock class items.

displayProperties.name: Adventure Tokens
displayProperties.description: Redeemable for great Adventure, or something.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Ornaments
displayProperties.description: These are Ornaments that can only be applied to armor.

displayProperties.name: Packages
displayProperties.description: Most often represented as rewards in game.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Gauntlets
displayProperties.description: These mods can only be applied to Gauntlets.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Ornaments/Titan
displayProperties.description: These are Ornaments that can only be applied to Titan armor.

displayProperties.name: Prophecy Offerings
displayProperties.description: This represents items involved in quests related to Osiris.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Damage
displayProperties.description: These are mods that affect the damage of your weapon, in type and/or amount.

displayProperties.name: Story Prizes
displayProperties.description: These represent items of interest in the story or missions of the game.

displayProperties.name: Warlock
displayProperties.description: Warlock class helmets, chest, arms and legs

displayProperties.name: Gag Prizes
displayProperties.description: Everyone loves raisins, right?

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Barrels
displayProperties.description: These represent alterations to the round, long part of the gun where bullets come out.  Or lasers I guess because we're in the future.

displayProperties.name: Currencies
displayProperties.description: Used to buy new weapons and gear.

displayProperties.name: Titan
displayProperties.description: Titan class helmets, chest, arms and legs

displayProperties.name: Masterworks Mods
displayProperties.description: Mods on items that provide Masterworks bonuses and challenges.

displayProperties.name: Breaker: Disruption
displayProperties.description: This item allows you to deal damage with the 'Disruption' damage type attribute.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Gameplay
displayProperties.description: These mods provide gameplay-altering benefits or effects.

displayProperties.name: Emblems
displayProperties.description: Icons and nameplates.

displayProperties.name: Hunter
displayProperties.description: Hunter class helmets, chest, arms and legs

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Class
displayProperties.description: These mods can only be applied to your class item.

displayProperties.name: Reputation Tokens
displayProperties.description: These are items that you turn in for reputation at Vendors.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Bowstring
displayProperties.description: Custom bowstrings that modify the abilities of your bow.

displayProperties.name: Submachine Guns
displayProperties.description: For the pew pew pews.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods
displayProperties.description: Mods that can be applied, or are intrinsic on, armor.

displayProperties.name: Clan Banners: Staff
displayProperties.description: These represent the 'staff' of the clan banner, which has its own benefits.

displayProperties.name: Challenge Cards
displayProperties.description: Items that allow you to modify the challenges available to you in an activity.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Frame
displayProperties.description: These represent modifications to the 'frame' of a gun.  Gun people will know better than I do what this means.

displayProperties.name: Breaker: Stagger
displayProperties.description: This item allows you to deal damage with the 'Stagger' damage type attribute.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Grips
displayProperties.description: Our game has a grip of grips.  These are all the grips you can apply to weapons.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Ornaments/Hunter
displayProperties.description: These are Ornaments that can only be applied to Hunter armor.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Sights
displayProperties.description: These are the various types of sights that can be applied to weapons.

displayProperties.name: Consumables
displayProperties.description: Ammo, upgrades and powerups.

displayProperties.name: Bonus Mods
displayProperties.description: Mods that provide conditional bonuses while you meet some qualifications/challenge.

displayProperties.name: Materials
displayProperties.description: Used to upgrade weapons and gear.

displayProperties.name: Bows
displayProperties.description: For those who prefer a silent takedown.

displayProperties.name: Shaders
displayProperties.description: Add color and texture to existing armor.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Launchers
displayProperties.description: When you'd rather that your explosions come in a bouncing variety.

displayProperties.name: Ships
displayProperties.description: Spacecrafts used to traverse between destinations.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Class/Titan
displayProperties.description: These mods can only be applied to Titan class items.

displayProperties.name: Ghost
displayProperties.description: Cosmetic shells for your Ghost.

displayProperties.name: Kinetic Weapon
displayProperties.description: Weapons that cause Kinetic damage.

displayProperties.name: Sparrows
displayProperties.description: Land vehicles used to quickly traverse a destination.

displayProperties.name: Energy Weapon
displayProperties.description: Weapons that cause Energy damage (Arc, Solar, Void)

displayProperties.name: Emotes
displayProperties.description: Strike a pose.

displayProperties.name: Power Weapon
displayProperties.description: Weapons that pack a hefty punch.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Scopes
displayProperties.description: These are the various types of scopes that can be applied to weapons.

displayProperties.name: Trace Rifles
displayProperties.description: A more different kind of rifle.

displayProperties.name: Subclasses
displayProperties.description: Builds for your characters.

displayProperties.name: Prophecy Tablets
displayProperties.description: And I don't mean handheld information devices.  Well, I guess I do.  It's a long story.

displayProperties.name: Blueprint
displayProperties.description: These items are not currently in use.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Arrows
displayProperties.description: Custom arrows that modify the abilities of your bow.

displayProperties.name: Seasonal Artifacts
displayProperties.description: An item that you can level up to unlock new mods specific to a season.

displayProperties.name: Clan Banners
displayProperties.description: This represents benefits provided by a Clan Banner.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Legs
displayProperties.description: These mods can only be applied to leg armor.

displayProperties.name: Ghost Mods
displayProperties.description: These mods can only be applied to Ghosts.

displayProperties.name: Quest
displayProperties.description: Quests that can be completed in Destiny.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Glow Effects
displayProperties.description: Make your armor sparkle.

displayProperties.name: Infusion Materials
displayProperties.description: This represents items that can be used in infusion.

displayProperties.name: Sword
displayProperties.description: Make sure the pointy end faces toward your enemy.

displayProperties.name: Armor Mods: Helmet
displayProperties.description: These mods can only be applied to helmets.

displayProperties.name: Mask
displayProperties.description: (Insert appropriate Jim Carrey quote here)

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Sword Guards
displayProperties.description: Different variations of guards on swords.

displayProperties.name: Dummies
displayProperties.description: These items are not actually ones you can obtain in the game, but rather are used to display information.

displayProperties.name: Mods
displayProperties.description: Item modifiers

displayProperties.name: Aura
displayProperties.description: Like, groovy man.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Magazines
displayProperties.description: This is when you wrap your gun in an old issue of Time and... no, that's not it.  These are alterations to where your bullets are held.

displayProperties.name: Clan Banner
displayProperties.description: There are many Banners like it, but this one is mine.

displayProperties.name: Breaker: Piercing
displayProperties.description: This item allows you to deal damage with the 'Shield piercing' damage type attribute.

displayProperties.name: Ship Mods: Transmat Effects
displayProperties.description: These mods change your transmat effect when using this ship.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Batteries
displayProperties.description: Because we're in the future, some weapons have batteries.  Don't ask me how they are charged.

displayProperties.name: Mods
displayProperties.description: Customizations for your items!

displayProperties.name: Linear Fusion Rifles
displayProperties.description: Yet another type of laser rifle.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Intrinsic
displayProperties.description: These represent properties that are intrinsic to weapons, and generally cannot be removed or replaced.

displayProperties.name: Weapon Mods: Launch Tubes
displayProperties.description: Some weapons don't have barrels as much as tubes from which missiles are launched.  These are variations of such tubes.

displayProperties.name: Item Sets
displayProperties.description: This represents a related set of items.  Note that these sets may have incomplete data.

displayProperties.name: Treasure Maps
displayProperties.description: Grab these from Cayde-6 and go on a treasure hunt!

displayProperties.name: Ship Mods
displayProperties.description: These are mods that can only be applied to your ship.

displayProperties.name: Ghost Mods: Trackers
displayProperties.description: These mods represent "Tracker" abilities that can be applied to Ghosts.

displayProperties.name: Clan Banners: Perks
displayProperties.description: These are perks provided by clan banners.

displayProperties.name: Vendor-Wrapped Items
displayProperties.description: Dummy items used to wrap purchases so that they can safely be refunded before opened.

displayProperties.name: Sparrow Mods: Perks
displayProperties.description: These mods provide some non-speed related perk or ability to sparrows.
